Code Interpretation of ZP02221:   ZP is the product (Zest Peppers),  02  is the month (February),  22  is the year (2022), and  1  is the batch number (first batch during 2022).

product_description: Coca-Cola Cherry Zero Sugar Fridge Pack, 12 - 12 FL OZ  CANS (144 FL OZ) in a 12-pack fridge pack carton. UPC 049000047516; UPC Cherry Coca-Cola Zero Sugar can  049000047561; Cherry Coca-Cola can 04905004. There are 2 12-packs per case.

distribution_pattern: U.S distribution to the following California, Colorado, and Illinois  Foreign distribution to the following: Germany, Morocco, and Canada
product_description: Whole Brown Almonds (bulk)
reason_for_recall: Firm's internal sampling identified a positive Salmonella result on Item 00113 that was on hand at the firm on 7/15/2022.  Firm elected to hold all inventory between the sanitation break from 7/5/2022 - 7/18/2022.  Some product from within that time frame was shipped to customers.  Although none of the products on the recall list tested positive for Salmonella, out of an abundance of caution the firm elected to proceed with a recall on the shipped products.

product_description: The content inside package is walnut but was mis-labeled as Nutritional Yeast and packaged in a stand up plastic pouch. Net Weight: 0.6lb (272g). UPC: 616316762060    The label is read in parts: "***Brand Name: Hummingbird ***Organic Nutritional Yeast Large Flake***".

code_info: Lot Code 22116    Lot code explanation: Julian Date lot code identifies date of manufacture.    Net Weight: 0.6lb (272g)    UPC: 616316762060    No other lots impacted. All other lots of product on hand have been inspected.
